summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6194 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Gilman's Addition, being the alley between 23rd Avenue West and 24th Avenue West, from West Dravus Street to West Bertona Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87778, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
